script.line: Oh my gosh!
Bark! Bark!
It worked! Aw Minty! You're back!
Mayoress... If you don't mind me saying...
That was the coolest thing ever?
That was the COOLEST THING EVER.
Ha! You kids are so sweet. It's just run-of-the-mill demon stuff...
A bit of blue flame and a few dozen grasping arms and everyone gets so excited, but it's nothing!
Although if I'm being totally honest... it's been quite some time since I had that much fun.
It's some of the most fun I've had in centuries!
Bark! Bark!
And Teens, I must say. Your Latin is pretty good!
Quae semper.
I mean it! Have you ever considered tutoring?
...Tutoring?
Yes! After all, your delinquency has racked up quite a few hours of community service...
But perhaps you might consider working that off helping students learn Latin!
Yeah, not our scene.
Well, you know... If you did help with schooling... I might be inclined to teach you a rite or two.
...For real?
I could be persuaded.
What do you say? Do we have a deal?
Hmmm... A deal with a demon.
Sounds trustworthy.
Yeah. We're in.
Brilliant! This is going to be cool AF!
And I mean the one with the swearing!
Nice.
BBut for now, I suppose I should go back and tend to my mayoral duties...
And we're gonna head back to the skatepark. Festi-Ball's a total Snoozefest.
What? You just performed an arcane ritual on a demon to catch a dog in a pro wrestling ring.
Zzzz.
Yeah. Total yawn. We're out. Prota, you wanna come hang?
Seriously?! With you?!
I-- No, I should probably head back and see my parents.
Cool. See you around.
And I'll see you around, too, Prota! Take care and remember-- no jaywalking!
